category: news
title: "Only 13% of banking and insurance industry fully utilising AI solutions"
excerpt: "While ethical artificial intelligence (AI) and analytics adoption can add about US$2 trillion (S$2.7 trillion) of value each year to the global banking and insurance industry, a Temasek survey showed that only 13 per cent of the sector uses AI solutions across the bulk of its processes."
